scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production parcel build --target default && mv dist/ar-button.js dist/ar-button.min.js
scripts.deploy:dev: gsutil rm -a gs://ar-button-dev/ar-button/** && gsutil cp -z js dist/*.js gs://ar-button-dev/ar-button/ && gsutil setmeta -h "Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache" gs://ar-button-dev/ar-button/*
scripts.deploy:prod: gsutil rm -a gs://ar-button/ar-button/** && gsutil cp -z js dist/*.js gs://ar-button/ar-button/
